answerText: Bleeding Edge[10] This American anarchist author loved nature and hated machinery. He wrote about working at a remote park ranger station in Desert Solitaire and about a post-apocalyptic Arizona in Good News.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Editors 2 | 21 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] This most recent novel by Thomas Pynchon came out in November 2013. It is loosely about fraud investigator Maxine Turnow and her investigation of a shady internet business, with 9/11 looming in the background.
